content.p: Gain an insight into the career and further study opportunities open to you and how to enhance your career prospects during your time at Nottingham. Jump to your subject in the American and Canadian Studies Archaeology Classics English Film, TV, Media and Communications History History of Art Liberal Arts Modern Languages Music Philosophy Theology and Religious Studies Aerospace Engineering Architectural Environmental Engineering Architecture Chemical and Environmental Engineering Civil Engineering Electrical and Electronic Engineering Manufacturing Engineering Materials Engineering and Materials Design Mechanical Engineering Product Design and Manufacture Biochemistry Biology Cancer Sciences Genetics Medical Physiology and Therapeutics Medicine Midwifery Neuroscience Pharmacology Physiotherapy Sport and Exercise Science Sport Rehabilitation Veterinary Medicine and Science Zoology Agriculture Animal Science Biotechnology Chemistry Computer Science Environmental Science and Environmental Biology Food and Nutritional Sciences Mathematical Sciences Microbiology Natural Sciences Pharmaceutical Sciences Pharmacy Physics Plant Biology Psychology Criminology Economics Education Geography Law Management Politics and International Relations Sociology and Social Policy telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
